statements: SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, trading_decision FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
SELECT post_date, sentiment_score, trading_decision FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE trading_decision = 'Buy' OR trading_decision = 'Sell';
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE trading_decision = 'BUY' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, trading_decision FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY post_date ASC, sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE post_date > '2022-04-01' AND trading_decision = 'SELL' ORDER BY trading_decision ASC, post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT decision_id, buy_sell, trade_date FROM TradingDecisions
SELECT post_id, post_text, post_date, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score, post_date, post_id FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_id, post_text FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT decision_id, buy_sell, trade_date FROM TradingDecisions ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, post_text, post_likes FROM social_media_data WHERE post_likes > 100 ORDER BY post_likes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_date, post_text FROM social_media_data WHERE username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY post_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_text, post_likes FROM social_media_data WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_likes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, post_date, post_likes FROM social_media_data WHERE post_likes BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY post_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE post_likes > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT username, post_text, post_date FROM social_media_data WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, post_text, post_likes FROM social_media_data WHERE post_text LIKE '%exciting%' ORDER BY post_likes DESC;
SELECT username, post_text, post_date FROM social_media_data WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT s.username, t.buy_or_sell, t.confidence_score FROM social_media_data s JOIN trading_decisions t ON s.id = t.post_id WHERE t.confidence_score > 0.7 ORDER BY t.confidence_score DESC, s.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT post_content, post_timestamp FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC;
SELECT record_id, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis_records WHERE sentiment_strength > 0.8;
SELECT post_id, buy_sell_action, confidence_score FROM trading_decisions WHERE buy_sell_action = 'BUY';
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 100 ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_timestamp FROM social_media_posts WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY post_timestamp ASC;
SELECT SUM(sentiment_strength) AS total_sentiment, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis_records GROUP BY sentiment_category HAVING total_sentiment > 50;
SELECT user_id, post_content, confidence_score FROM social_media_posts p JOIN trading_decisions t ON p.post_id = t.post_id WHERE t.buy_sell_action = 'BUY' ORDER BY confidence_score DESC;

SELECT username, join_date, followers_count, post_content, sentiment_category FROM social_media_users u JOIN social_media_posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN sentiment_analysis_records s ON p.post_id = s.post_id WHERE sentiment_strength > 0.5 ORDER BY followers_count DESC, post_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT account_name, follower_count FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE commenter_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT account_name, posting_frequency FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY posting_frequency ASC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM posts JOIN sentiment_analysis ON posts.post_id = sentiment_analysis.post_id;
SELECT DISTINCT commenter_name, comment_date FROM comments WHERE comment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
